title: 1dfft
description: Compute the absolute value of the FFT of input columns from an AFNI 1D file.

infile.title: Input file
infile.description: Input .1D file containing an ASCII list of numbers arranged in columns.

outfile.title: Output file
outfile.description: Output file to store the FFT results.

ignore.title: Ignore lines
ignore.description: Skip the first 'sss' lines in the input file. [default = no skipping]

use.title: Use lines
use.description: Use only 'uuu' lines of the input file. [default = use them all]

nfft.title: FFT length
nfft.description: Set FFT length to 'nnn'. [default = length of data (# of lines used)]

tocx.title: Save Re and Im parts flag
tocx.description: Save Re and Im parts of transform in 2 columns.

fromcx.title: Convert complex to real flag
fromcx.description: Convert 2 column complex input into 1 column real output. Note: This will not work if the original data FFT length was an odd number.

hilbert.title: Hilbert transform flag
hilbert.description: When -fromcx is used, the inverse FFT will do the Hilbert transform instead.

nodetrend.title: No detrend flag
nodetrend.description: Skip the detrending of the input.
